reviews.review_msg: Incredibly kind and caring professor, and is flexible about assignments and extensions. Made what could have been a very boring class decently interesting with his lectures. Posts lecture slides online, but ties concepts to the reading material way better in person. Only down side is his assignment instructions are very vague, but hes a fair marker

Honestly, he has been my favorite professor so far in my undergrad. He is kind, easy to talk to & picks really creative material to present to the class for a further understanding. Overall an awesome prof. Lots of readings! But theyre definitely not boring in comparison to other classes! Hes awesome!!!! Def made my semester better

Efe is a lovely guy, but needs more experience as a professor. He is a researcher, not a teacher. Be prepared to take the reigns. Instructions are vague, lectures unclear and convoluted. BUT he is easy to work with. Will gladly give extensions or help when you ask for it. Do the readings, attend lecture, ask for clarification. Lots of group work!
